title: WEDNESDAY 4/14 - Cardinals add another weapon on offense
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY 4/14 - Cardinals add another weapon on offense
description:
Seahawks wide receiver Tyler Lockett (0:05) speaking to the media for the first time since signing his extension. He talks about the disappointment of not winning it all last year. The Cardinals signing former Steelers running back James Conner (1:19), he spoke about his decision to head to Arizona. Ohio State QB Justin Fields(2:30) will hold his second pro day today with several of the top teams picking in the draft in attendance

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
